meaningMnemonic: You take all of your <radical>thread</radical> and <radical>allocate</radical> them into one place to <kanji>unite</kanji> them. With all your thread united and wrapped together, you're ready to <kanji>rule</kanji> and <kanji>govern</kanji> the world!
readingMnemonic: You're busy trying to <kanji>unite</kanji> all of your thread, twisting and tying and wrapping, and suddenly you look at the ball in your hands and see <reading>とう</reading>きょう. You've united this thread into the shape of とうきょう. There are even little pins for all the famous neighborhoods and tourist spots. This is strange, because you don't remember putting them there.
